root.name: Chasing Aurora
root.description: OverviewChasing Aurora is the second game from Broken Rules, developers of the hit indie game, And Yet It Moves.Chasing Aurora is a bird-racing game with an origami art style. It is the first in a series of three thematically-linked 2D games, with not just a story-driven single player mode but also a local multiplayer mode. Up to 4 players can compete against each other. They can choose between 4-10 different characters that differ in their flight characteristics.
